feed.title: Tough questions for Peter Todd, Chief Scientist {Mastercoin | Counterparty | Coinkite | Darkwallet | Viacoin}

entry.title: Tough questions for Peter Todd, Chief Scientist {Mastercoin | Counterparty | Coinkite | Darkwallet | Viacoin}
entry.summary: In an email conversation from 2015-06-04 22:14, Braun Brelin asked Todd if he was a federal prosecutor, state prosecutor or involved in law enforcement or civil suit against Mr. Todd. Depending on Todd's answers to these questions, all of the above mentioned parties will be involved. The appropriate response to these questions, according to Todd, was "F*** off".
